description: Talk to Edmond to start the quest.

2.step: Talk to Alrena to give dwellberries for a gas mask.

description: Talk to Alrena to give her dwellberries for a gas mask.

3.step: Take the picture of Elena off of the table.

description: Pick-up the picture of Elena off the table.
Talk to Edmond.

5.step: Use 4 buckets of water on the mud patch.

description: Use all 4 buckets of water on the mud patch to create a softer ground to dig through.

6.step: Use a spade on the softened ground.

description: Use a spade on the softened ground to get through it.
Attempt to open the grill to be able to attach the rope in the next step.

8.step: Use a rope on the grill.

description: Use a rope on the grill.
Ask Edmond to help you pull the grill off.

10.step: Put on the gasmask and climb up the pipe.

description: Since Edmond will not allow to climb up the pipe without a gasmask, put on the gasmask and climb up the pipe.

11.subtitle: Finding Elena
11.step: Talk to Jethick for a book. (Chat: 1-1)

description: Talk to Jethick for a book.
Talk to Martha.

location: Upstairs of the north house in West Ardougne.
description: Go upstairs and talk to Milli.

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Go to the south building with X marks and attempt to open the door only to be stopped.

location: Large building north of town square in West Ardougne.
description: Talk to the clerk.

location: Large building north of town square in West Ardougne.
description: Go through the door and talk to the Bravek.

17.step: Use chocolate dust on the bucket of milk (DON'T EAT) and then add snape grass.

18.step: Use the hangover cure on Bravek to get a warrant. (Chat 3)

location: Large building north of town square in West Ardougne.
description: Use the hangover cure on Bravek to get a warrant.

19.subtitle: Rescuing Elena
19.step: Enter the Mourners' house ('X' on the doors).

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Enter the Mourners' house ('X' on the doors)

20.step: Search the barrel west of the staircase for a small key.

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Enter the Mourners' house ('X' on the doors) and show them the warrant to get inside.

21.step: Go downstairs, enter the cell and talk to Elena.

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Go downstairs, enter the cell and talk to Elena.

22.subtitle: Finishing up
22.step: Go back down the manhole and speak to Edmond.

description: Go back down the manhole and speak to Edmond to finish the quest.
